title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Meet the LC-dolida 3-in-1 Sleep Headphones and Eye Mask. It helps you relax, fall asleep faster, and stay asleep.

Easy to understand:
- What it is: A soft eye mask that blocks light, with gentle Bluetooth speakers inside. You can listen to music, audiobooks, or calming sounds without separate earbuds.
- Very comfortable: Memory foam and soft, skin-friendly fabric. Breathable and hypoallergenic. The mask is shaped to keep pressure off your eyes.
- Great for side sleepers: The speakers are thin and cushioned, so you can lie on your side comfortably.
- Blocks light well: The 3D contoured design fits your face to keep out light, helping you sleep in bright rooms or during daytime naps.

Simple to use:
- Connects wirelessly to most phones and tablets (Bluetooth 5.2). Just turn it on and select it on your device.
- Stable connection up to about 45 feet.
- Battery lasts 8–10 hours per charge. Recharges in about 1–2 hours with the included cable.
- Adjustable strap to fit most head sizes.

Helps with:
- Sleep and naps
- Insomnia or trouble staying asleep
- Air travel and long car rides
- Meditation and yoga
- Migraine sensitivity to light
- Dry, irritated eyes

Why you’ll like it:
- Clear, HD stereo sound at comfortable volumes
- No tangled wires
- No pressure on the eyes or ears
- Cool and comfortable all night

Makes a thoughtful gift for men or women, parents or grandparents, teens or adults—great for birthdays, holidays, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, and more.

Quick start:
1) Charge the mask until the light shows full.
2) Hold the power button to turn it on.
3) On your phone, open Bluetooth and choose “LC-dolida” (or similar).
4) Play your favorite music or sleep sounds, adjust the volume, and relax.
5) To clean the fabric, remove the speakers as directed, then hand-wash the mask and air dry.

If you want simple comfort, darkness, and gentle sound to fall asleep, this mask makes bedtime easy.
